lines.text: Hey, Santa Claus, where ya goin'?
I guess I'm going to jail, son.
I'll come up and see you some time.
[the short's last line is a reminder of Mae West's most popular quote of "Come up and see me, sometime!"]
[the closing quote said by 'Spanky', 'I'll come up and see you, sometime.' was one of his most popular and repeated quotes]

[Immediately, after Spanky saw Emerson Treacy came in his house and unexpectely dance with Gay Seabrook]
Gee! Pop's gone cuckoo!

[after the quick and short dance is over]
Emerson Treacy, are you drunk?
